articles.description: Ange Postecoglou will "never understand" any Tottenham fans wanting their own team to lose even if it helps deny Arsenal the Premier League title.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Tottenham boss will 'never understand' Spurs fans who want to lose to deny Arsenal title

articles.description: No-one could have envisaged that 10 years on from his US PGA Championship win at Valhalla we have not seen Rory McIlroy add to his major tally, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy's US PGA Championship tilt at Valhalla buoyed by Quail Hollow victory

articles.description: Super Bowl champions the Kansas City Chiefs will begin the defence of their title against the Baltimore Ravens at Arrowhead Stadium on Thursday, 5 September.
articles.title: NFL: Kansas City Chiefs to begin Super Bowl defence against Baltimore Ravens

articles.description: Tyson Fury's father John is injured in a fracas with members of Oleksandr Usyk’s camp as the build-up to Saturday’s world heavyweight contest begins.
articles.title: John Fury injured in fracas with Oleksandr Usyk's camp

articles.description: New Zealand captain Sam Cane will retire from international rugby at the end of 2024 after signing a three-year deal with Japanese side Suntory Sungoliath.
articles.title: Sam Cane: New Zealand captain to retire from international game

articles.description: Ferrari recruit Jerome D’Ambrosio and Loic Serra from Mercedes as they seek to build a team that can challenge for the title again.
articles.title: Ferrari recruit Jerome d’Ambrosio and Loic Serra from Mercedes

articles.description: Match of the Day 2 pundit Martin Keown says Arsenal have ticked off "a checklist of what it takes to be champions" after their win at Manchester United.
articles.title: Manchester United 0-1 Arsenal: 'Arsenal have ticked off the checklist of champions' - Martin Keown

articles.description: With James Anderson retiring from Test cricket in July, BBC Sport looks at the options available to Brendon McCullum and Ben Stokes as England build towards next winter's Ashes.
articles.title: James Anderson retires: Which bowlers could form England's new-look pace attack for Ashes?

articles.description: Two matches at the Italian Open in Rome are suspended as climate activists protest.
articles.title: Climate protesters interrupt two Italian Open matches in Rome

articles.description: The Indiana Pacers demolish the New York Knicks to tie their NBA play-off series at 2-2.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Indiana Pacers beat New York Knicks to level series
